price: (36) And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٖ مَّجۡنُونِۭ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna a-innā latārikū ālihatinā lishāʿirin majnūnin
